title: 10/19: Start or Sit (NFC); Beat the Waiver Wire (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Recapping that ugly game from last night (3:00) and wondering if David Johnson is a buy low or a player to sit going forward. And is Phillip Lindsay going to be better than Johnson rest of season? ... Big news from around the NFL (10:22) as it may be time to pick up Cameron Meredith and Dalvin Cook's availability is in question. Also find out who Dave is excited about this week (17:40) and who we're nervous about (20:46). Then we'll Beat the Waiver Wire (26:22) and tell you who to pick up for Week 8 ... CAR-PHI (32:30), CLE-TB (38:01), NYG-ATL (44:24), NE-CHI (50:16), LAR-SF (56:15), DAL-WAS (58:50) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
